iVolley is an app that will get you general tips, advices and information about the world of volleyball. 

 It has two main sections. The first one talks about the rules of Volleyball, along with the freq√ºent asked questions. 

The second one shows the top ranking teams on the VNL (Volleyball Nation League).
The FIVB Volleyball Men\'s Nations League is an annual international volleyball competition contested by the senior men\'s national teams of the members of the International Volleyball Federation
